name: Word Game - a word puzzle game
name_original: Word Game - a word puzzle game
description:
Word Game is a Word Puzzle Game for you , and it is easy to play and challenging!

Try to Search and Find all hidden words in given letters ,then link& connect the letters anyway you like to build the word! It starts off as an easy word game and becomes challenging! You will have fun improving your vocabulary and spelling skills. You‘ll never experience a dull moment after you try this most addicting word puzzle game! Your brain will thank you for the workout!

FEATURES：
1. 1000+ levels for you to play
2. Daily bonus rewards
3. Daily Challenge mode
4. Difficulty increases along with levels. Easy to play, but hard to beat!
5. Play OFFLINE in anytime and anywhere.
6. Applicable to Any Ages!

HOW TO PLAY：
1. Correct swipe the letters to form a specific hidden word.
2. Find as many words as possible to unlock levels and earn extra bonus coins.
3. Fill in every block with a word! Earn coins when you discover coins words.
4. Have difficulty coming up with the word games? You can use a hint to help solve the level.

Best way to relax and train your brain.Download Word Game now!
